biotools.summary:
comprehensive open-source software for reproducible analysis and visualization of intracranial EEG data.

RAVE: R Analysis and Visualization of intracranial Electroencephalography.

For all RAVE info, including installation instructions, visit https://openwetware.org/wiki/RAVE.
